title: It's Like This, Cat
description: Kindle edition of the Newbery Award winning classic novel with an active table of contents.The story follows Dave Mitchell, a 14-year-old who is growing up in mid-20th century New York City. His mother is asthmatic, her attacks worsened by the stress she feels when Dave and his father have their frequent arguments. Dave's refuge after a clash with his father is with Kate, an elderly neighbor whose apartment is filled with the stray cats she loves. Dave adopts one of the cats, names it "Cat", and takes it home. "Cat" brings both joy and sadness into his life.
author: Emily Cheney Neville
